comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: How will this happen? It is difficult to conclude a guarantee for your home with a person who is thousands of kilometers away from you and cannot verify your data. Try to mortgage your home or tell a friend or the bank about it, but it is difficult to obtain such a loan here.It's your first post and no one will take it seriously.

comments.author: PytagoraZ
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on September 22, 2023, 03:02:18 AMHow will this happen? It is difficult to conclude a guarantee for your home with a person who is thousands of kilometers away from you and cannot verify your data. Try to mortgage your home or tell a friend or the bank about it, but it is difficult to obtain such a loan here.It's your first post and no one will take it seriously.Actually it's easy, the OP only needs to send his house via the bitcoin network, I'm sure someone will be willing to provide a loan after getting collateral. But if the OP can't deliver the house maybe he's just lying about having a house In reality, it's very easy to get a loan from a bank with a house as collateral, or maybe the OP is an idealist who doesn't want to deal with banks and chose bitcoin.. It's amazing

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 22, 2023, 09:39:09 AMQuote from: Cade2023 on September 21, 2023, 10:49:22 PMHey i need 12500â‚¬ loan I have big collateral but dont want to say it that post (house collateral)8weekPer week payback 1800â‚¬Â Pm me on telegram or discord if possible cadev5#9919@Cade202211I will help you get a loan but you will have to give me â‚¬500 in advance without asking a question to the address located on my profile. Send it then text with the transaction ID. I will start processing. Are we in a deal?You should be careful with troll posts like this, especially by saying "Are we in a deal?" as the OP could easily take you up on your offer, send the 500 eur then you are entitled to honor the deal...or, stuck with drama because you didn't (even if you refund).At least state that you're joking/being sarcastic when you are when it comes to anything relating a transaction, for your own protection of not entering a contract that you actually don't want to be involved in.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Is there any scam reported to someone who provided a loan to newbies without any collateral, just like these accounts do?
